subject: Login Bug - Cannot access dashboard
body: Users are reporting they cannot login to the dashboard after the recent update. Error message shows 'Invalid credentials' even with correct password.

subject: Feature Request - Dark Mode
body: Please add dark mode support to the application. Many users work late at night and would appreciate this feature.

subject: Performance Issue - Slow page load
body: The tickets page takes 10+ seconds to load when there are more than 100 tickets. This needs optimization.

subject: UI Bug - Button alignment
body: The submit button on the upload form is misaligned on mobile devices.

subject: Security Concern - API exposure
body: The API endpoint /api/internal/admin is publicly accessible without authentication.

subject: Enhancement - Export to Excel
body: Add ability to export ticket data to Excel format for reporting purposes.
